page.title: 12 KILMINSTER FARM
page.content:
Kilminster farm is at map reference { 870055.}The farmer told us that he grew barley and wheat on his farm. We found out that he grows grass for hay.We also found out that he had 40 cows,1 donkey,3 dogs,150 pigs and 7 cats. On his 250 acre farm he has 12 buildings including the farm house. Sometimes he exports his produce to other countries and sometimes he keeps it for pig food. The farmer has lots of machinery including 1 combine harvester,3 tractors,1 baler,1 mower for the tractor,1 cultivator,2 ploughs, 1 hay turner,2 lorries and a van.
{
